title: Bloomberg Markets: Bright on Big Names Investing in Africa Tech
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bright on Big Names Investing in Africa Tech
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jake Bright Contributor TechCrunch Discussing Blue chip companies entering/expanding in Africa's technology expansion, including Uber, IBM and Netflix.
